title: Love Live! Hasunosora Girls' High School Idol Club 5th Live Tour ~4Pair Power Spread!!!!~
overview: Love Live! Hasunosora Girls' High School Idol Club 5th Live Tour ~4Pair Power Spread!!!!~ (ラブライブ！蓮ノ空女学院スクールアイドルクラブ 5th Live Tour ～4Pair Power Spread!!!!～) is Hasunosora Girls' High School Idol Club's fifth live tour concert that will take place in the following locations:  - Mira-Cra Park! presents Heart Stage: Yoyogi 1st National Gymnasium in Tokyo on October 4 & 5, 2025  - DOLLCHESTRA presents Diamond Stage: Aichi Sky Expo Hall A in Tokoname on November 8 & 9, 2025  - Edel Note presents Spade Stage: Osaka-Jou Hall in Osaka on November 19 & 20, 2025  - Cerise Bouquet presents Clover Stage: K-Arena Yokohama in Kanagawa on December 6 & 7, 2025
